name: Light The Match
description:
A little game I made in 2 afternoon  for the LOVE Jam 2019 , following the theme "Friction".

The goal of the game is to light as much matches as possible , by touching the paper on the side , but be careful and avoid water drops , you control the matches with your mouse.

I used the font "PixelFJVerdana12pt" and made all the other assets myself. The game was programmed for Love 11.2.
